text: Need Nathan King for Repco campaign. Budget around $2,714, looking for 3 x Store opening, 3 x Meet and greet, 2 x Product photography, 1 x 15-second TikTok, 2 x Professional headshots. 3 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 8 months. Engagement period: 2 months.
